about.summary: Shared libraries for MySQL database client applications

name: mysql-libs
raw_recipe:

package:

    version: 8.0.22
source:

        - patches/0005-Use-macports-legacy-support-for-features-10.9.patch
        - patches/0006-Remove-forceful-injection-of-debug-info.patch
        - patches/0007-Link-libgcc-libstdc-statically-for-codgen-binaries.patch

    sha256: ba765f74367c638d7cd1c546c05c14382fd997669bcd9680278e907f8d7eb484
